direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to a collection associated with a key, but putAll adds a collection of values.
Both methods modify the collection associated with a key, but removeMapping removes a specific value rather than adding.
put relies on getCollection to retrieve the collection associated with a key, indicating a strong dependency.
put uses createCollection to instantiate a new collection if one does not already exist for the key.
Both methods involve modifying the state of the map, but clear removes all mappings while put adds a single mapping.
Both methods involve checking the presence of elements in the map, but containsValue checks for a specific value across all collections.
Both methods involve operations on a specific key, but iterator retrieves an iterator for the collection associated with the key.
Both methods involve operations on a specific key, but size retrieves the size of the collection associated with the key.
